title: Tech News: Corporations, Crime and Cryptocurrency
itunes:title: Tech News: Corporations, Crime and Cryptocurrency
description:
Hackers share billions of passwords while others infiltrate EA's internal systems. El Salvador moves to make bitcoin legal tender within the country. And politicians propose legislation that could mean huge changes for some major tech companies.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
